channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Improve the commands in your extensions】提高扩展中的命令
item.description: 【As Visual Studio extension authors, our goal is to create tools that empower developers across diverse environments. A key part of this mission involves ensuring that your extension commands remain accessible and consistent across all Visual Studio locales. In your VSSDK extensions, by adding the CanonicalName property to your commands in the .vsct file, you […]】作为Visual Studio扩展作者，我们的目标是创建工具，以增强各种环境中的开发人员的能力。此任务的关键部分是确保您的扩展命令在所有Visual Studio Locales中保持易于访问和一致。在您的VSSDK扩展程序中，通过将CanonicalName属性添加到.vsct文件中的命令中，您[…]

item.title: 【Introducing New Tools and Features in the Responses API in Azure AI Foundry】在Azure AI Foundry中的响应API中引入新工具和功能
item.description: 【With the introduction of the Responses API, Microsoft is enabling a new standard for AI development within the Azure ecosystem. Originally launched by OpenAI and now natively supported in Azure AI Foundry, the Responses API combines the simplicity of the Chat Completions API with the advanced tool-calling capabilities of the Assistants API. It offers a […]】随着响应API的引入，Microsoft为Azure生态系统中的AI开发提供了新的标准。 API最初由OpenAI推出，现在由Azure AI铸造厂提供了本地支持，API将聊天完成API的简单性与助手API的高级工具称呼功能结合在一起。它提供了[…]

item.title: 【Azure AI Foundry MCP Server May 2025 Update: Adding Models, Knowledge & Evaluation】Azure AI Foundry MCP服务器2025年5月更新：添加模型，知识和评估
item.description: 【Major expansion of Azure AI Foundry MCP Server with new Models, Knowledge Management, and Evaluation capabilities joining the existing Agent Services, enabling developers to interact with Azure AI through natural language.】Azure AI Foundry MCP服务器的主要扩展具有新的模型，知识管理和评估功能，可加入现有代理服务，使开发人员能够通过自然语言与Azure AI进行交互。

item.title: 【DocumentDB Local – MongoDB API on Your Machine】DocumentDB本地 - 机器上的MongoDB API
item.description: 【Introduction DocumentDB Local provides a lightweight, containerized environment that lets you develop and test applications locally using a MongoDB-compatible interface. It’s ideal for prototyping or running integration tests without needing a cloud setup. When paired with the DocumentDB Extension for Visual Studio Code, it creates a focused and consistent local development environment. DocumentDB Local is […]】简介DocumentDB Local提供了一个轻巧的容器化环境，可让您使用MongoDB兼容接口在本地开发和测试应用程序。它是原型制作或运行集成测试的理想选择，而无需云设置。当与Visual Studio代码的DocumentDB扩展配对时，它会创建一个集中且一致的本地开发环境。 documentdb local是[…]

item.title: 【Getting started with AI in SQL Server 2025 on Windows】在Windows上使用SQL Server 2025中的AI入门
item.description: 【Back in the earlier part of the year (February maybe?), I put this tutorial together for our early adopters in the SQL Server 2025 program. It’s a guide for setting up SQL Server 2025 in a Hyper-V VM (I used Windows Server) with Ollama and ngnix as an https proxy. It’s a variation of my […]】回到今年早期（也许是2月？），我将本教程放在SQL Server 2025程序中。这是用于在Hyper-V VM（我使用Windows Server）中设置SQL Server 2025的指南，将Ollama和NGNIX作为HTTPS代理。这是我[…]的变体

item.title: 【Semantic Kernel and Microsoft.Extensions.AI: Better Together, Part 2】语义内核和Microsoft.extensions.ai：更好地在一起，第2部分
item.description: 【This is Part 2 of our series on integrating Microsoft.Extensions.AI with Semantic Kernel. In Part 1, we explored the relationship between these technologies and how they complement each other. Now, let’s dive into practical examples showing how to use Microsoft.Extensions.AI abstractions with Semantic Kernel in non-agent scenarios. Getting Started with Microsoft.Extensions.AI and Semantic Kernel Before we […]】这是我们有关Microsoft.extensions.ai与语义内核集成的系列系列的第2部分。在第1部分中，我们探讨了这些技术之间的关系以及它们如何相互补充。现在，让我们介绍实践示例，以显示如何在非代理方案中使用语义内核的Microsoft.extensions.ai抽象。在[…]

item.title: 【Azure Cosmos DB TV – Everything New in Azure Cosmos DB from Microsoft Build 2025】Azure Cosmos DB电视 - Microsoft Build 2025的Azure Cosmos DB中的所有新事物
item.description: 【Microsoft Build 2025 brought major innovations to Azure Cosmos DB, and in Episode 105 of Azure Cosmos DB TV, Principal Program Manager Mark Brown sits down with Kirill Gavrylyuk, Vice President and GM of Azure Cosmos DB, to break it all down. Whether you’re developing AI-native apps, building with MongoDB, or just looking for better […]】Microsoft Build 2025为Azure Cosmos DB带来了重大创新，在Azure Cosmos DB TV的第105集中，首席计划经理Mark Brown与Azure Cosmos DB的副总裁兼GM GM Kirill Gavrylyuk坐下来，以分解所有这些。无论您是开发AI本地应用程序，使用MongoDB构建，还是只是寻找更好的[…]

item.title: 【Announcing dotnet run app.cs – A simpler way to start with C# and .NET 10】宣布dotnet run app.cs - 一种从c＃和.net 10开始的简单方法
item.description: 【We are super excited to introduce a new feature that was released as part of .NET 10 Preview 4 that makes getting started with C# easier than ever. You can now run a C# file directly using dotnet run app.cs. This means you no longer need to create a project file or scaffold a whole […]】我们非常高兴地引入了一项新功能，该功能是.NET 10 Preview 4的一部分，该功能比以往任何时候都更加容易开始C＃。现在，您可以使用Dotnet Run App.c.直接运行C＃文件。这意味着您不再需要创建一个项目文件或脚手架[…]

item.title: 【Code quicker with Azure AI Foundry playgrounds and Visual Studio Code】使用Azure AI Foundry Playgrounds和Visual Studio代码更快地代码
item.description: 【The "Open in VS Code" workflow, part of the Azure AI Foundry extension for Visual Studio Code, accelerates developer velocity by integrating agent or model API endpoints and code samples into a new workspace in VS Code for Web. This feature streamlines the development process, enabling rapid prototyping and deployment with just one click.】Visual Studio代码的Azure AI Foundry扩展的一部分“在VS代码中打开”工作流程，通过将代理或模型API端点和模型API端点和代码示例集成到Web的VS代码中的新工作区中来加速开发人员速度。此功能简化了开发过程，仅一键单击即可快速进行原型制作和部署。

item.title: 【How do I convert a WIC bitmap back to a GDI HBITMAP?】如何将WIC位图转换回GDI HBITMAP？
item.description: 【You can copy the bits into a DIB section.】您可以将位复制到DIB部分中。
